attributes.additional_details:
1.Give powers to parents, teachers, police to punish children and teenagers.
2.Make parents responsible for children and teenagers behaviour.Withdraw ALL benefits and payments.Have the parents AND children do community service together.
3.Bring back National Service for young adults and a type of Summer Camp where youngsters do community volunteering and new skills.
4.Curfew for children to age of 16.
5.Raise drinking age to 21.
6.Change Human Rights Laws or get rid of them to stop favouring criminal and not the victim.
7.Stop awarding young criminals or those in probation services from awarding holidays,days out and other luxuries for bad behaviour.
8.Criminal Justice System needs to be overhauled to make laws harsher to fit the crime on advice of victim or victim's family.
9.Change prison service don't allow luxuries inside jail,TVs, stop benefits and voting rights.
10.All convicted immigrants should automatically deported to birth country.
